featured.text: The goals of becoming an outstanding player and playing college ball were never far from Deborah’s mind.
A player of Mills had possession of the ball, and Deborah ran to guard against her.

definition.zh_def: 球體，通常用於運動或遊戲的圓形物體。
definition.en_def: A spherical object used in various sports or games.
definition.example: She kicked the ball across the field.
